name: Cathbad

screenshots.caption: Results of grep command displayed in wizard
A wizard for the grep command.
The first non-Wizard cathbad user interface!  And it works!

short_description:
See http://myddrin.com/trashdeerwood/index.php?cat=2 for addtional development information.

Cathbad is an xml-defined language for the creation of distributed user interfaces.  This means an application may be centrally installed on a webserver.
